Ten Examples out of thirty



If you hover over the icon, the box it's in will extend to the right, the small icon will vanish, and a larger icon will takes its place.


Hovering over the button will make it depress slightly, and clicking on the button will make it depress completely and light up.

Hover to Zoom

Hovering on the picture of the galaxy will make it expand. It doesn't affect the text in the box around it.


Hovering over the images will make them display in order. It's a sloppy way of doing it I'm sure, but it sort of works. The opacity fades to 0, and the subsequent images are delayed so they start to dissapear once they are visible.


Hovering over the blue box will case a flower stem to pop up, and then petals once the stem is at its peak.


The red boxes react to being hovered over, and dont affect the things around them.


Hovering over the center circle will cause it to fill its box.
You
Tube


A quick and dirty youtube button. Hovering will change the button and font color, clicking will depress the button.
Learn More


Hovering over the image causes it to blur, and the text "Learn More" will appear.
More contact about blog


Hovering over 'More' will cause the box to extend, revealing other elements that could be links.
